summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2002 JEEP LIBERTY.  THE CONTACT'S VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED ACCORDING TO NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER 06V288000 (SUSPENSION:FRONT:CONTROL ARM:LOWER BALL JOINT) IN 2007.  ONE YEAR LATER, WHILE ATTEMPTING TO MAKE LEFT TURNS, HE HEARD A LOUD POPPING NOISE COMING FROM THE REAR DRIVER SIDE TIRE.  HE HAS NOT HAD THE VEHICLE INSPECTED TO DETERMINE THE CAUSE OF THE FAILURE.  THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 60,000 AND CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 80,000.
